articles.author: LORNE COOK, SAMUEL PETREQUIN
articles.title: The EU agrees a new €50 billion aid package for Ukraine despite Hungary's veto threat - The Associated Press
articles.description: Leaders of the 27 European Union countries have sealed a deal to provide Ukraine with 50 billion euros ($54 billion) in support for its war-ravaged economy after Hungary dropped weeks of threats to veto the measure. European Council President Charles Michel s…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) Leaders of the 27 European Union countries sealed a deal Thursday to provide Ukraine with 50 billion euros ($54 billion) in support for its war-ravaged economy after Hungary dropped wee… [+6038 chars]
